Connector Compatibility

JST Compatible Terminal Wire

Full range of JST-compatible terminal wire assemblies offering the same quality and reliability as genuine JST connectors at significantly lower cost. Direct from our ISO 9001 certified factory.

Why Choose JST Compatible Solutions?

30-50%
Cost Savings

Significant cost reduction without compromising quality or performance.

100%
Compatibility

Fully compatible with existing JST housings, headers, and applications.

48h
Quick Delivery

Rapid prototyping and production from our dedicated manufacturing facility.

Quality You Can Trust

Dimensional Compatibility

Precise dimensional control ensures our compatible connectors mate perfectly with existing JST housings and headers.

Material Quality

PA66, PBT, and other high-quality materials with UL94V-0 flame rating for safety and reliability.

Electrical Performance

Current and voltage ratings meet or exceed JST specifications for reliable power delivery.

Testing & Validation

100% continuity testing, pull testing, and inspection ensures consistent quality.

Complete Product Range

Receptacle Housings

Wire-side housings with friction lock or positive lock mechanisms.

  • • PH/XH/EH/VH/ZH series
  • • 2-15 positions
  • • Various color options

PCB Headers

Through-hole and surface mount headers for PCB mounting.

  • • THT and SMT options
  • • Vertical and right-angle
  • • Breakaway styles available

Crimp Terminals

Tin-plated copper terminals for reliable wire connections.

  • • Various wire gauge ranges
  • • Bulk and reel packaging
  • • Crimp tooling available

Applications Using JST Compatible Connectors

Consumer Electronics LED Lighting Industrial Controls Automotive Electronics Power Supplies Battery Management IoT Devices Medical Equipment
